name: Pinkpop

config_properties.name: Pinkpop
config_properties.description: The longest-running annual music festival in the Netherlands, held in Landgraaf since 1970.

ai_profile:
**Pinkpop 2026 Festival Profile**

Pinkpop 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 32 artists, showcasing a rich mix of genres led by Alternative Rock (8 acts), Pop (7 acts), and Indie Rock (6 acts). This year’s festival leans heavily into alternative and indie sounds, while also incorporating niche genres like Grunge, Gothic Rock, and Rave Rock for a diverse auditory experience. With 100% of the lineup having Spotify presence, attendees can easily explore the music before the event.

The festival highlights a strong international presence, with artists hailing from the United Kingdom (9), the United States (9), and the Netherlands (7), among others, showcasing a blend of global and local talent. While the lineup is predominantly male (20 artists), female and mixed-gender acts also feature prominently, with 8 and 4 artists respectively. However, there is limited representation of artists of color, with only one act falling into this category.

Audience ratings suggest a solid reception, with an average score of 6.88 and the majority of artists rated between 7 and 8 out of 10. While there’s room for growth in terms of gender and ethnic diversity, Pinkpop 2026’s wide-ranging musical styles and international lineup ensure a dynamic festival experience for fans of varied tastes.
